title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-1.16 - Lighting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-1.16 - Lighting

State Regulations

While amusement devices, temporary structures, viewing
stands and tents are in operation, all areas of access to and exits therefrom
shall be provided with illumination by natural or artificial means sufficient
to guard against personal injuries under these circumstances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-1.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
